ygData.subject: RE: Givin' up on love and everything
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, nothing wrong with that then! You know, I sometimes wonder about marriage. I mean I enjoy it and all and I love my wife but sometimes I just want that
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, nothing wrong with that then! You know, I sometimes wonder about
marriage. I mean I enjoy it and all and I love my wife but sometimes I
just want that "alone" time ya'know. That time where you can do what you
want to do and don't have to answer to anyone. ;-)

-----Original Message-----
Message: 4
Date: Sat, 3 Aug 2002 16:01:22 -0500
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
Subject: Re: RE: Givin' up on love and everything

> I agree with Barto Su, Don't give up. It will happen someday. Here let
> me tell you my story and see if you feel any better ok?
>
Huh? You can't give up something you never tried. lol. I'm not feeling
bad
or anything. I just don't give a rats ass. lol.
I don't want to date anyone or anything like that. Just not interested.
It
would probably cut into my EQ gaming time too much.
I'm happy being single.
